entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
